document.full_text: champion rafa nadal cut loose after a shaky french open start to batter robin soderling 6-4 6-1 7-6 and andy murray again tried to tie himself in knots before easily sealing his semi-final spot wednesday.
document.title: nadal and murray find their groove in paris
lines_and_colors: champion rafa nadal cut loose after a shaky french open start to batter robin soderling 6-4 6-1 7-6 and andy murray again tried to tie himself in knots before easily sealing his semi-final spot wednesday.
